headline: 5 Financial Transaction Stocks to Watch Despite Elevated Expense Level
summary: Cross-border growth, e-commerce expansion and M&A momentum support companies in the Financial Transaction Services space, but rising technology costs and consumer spending pressures weigh on margins. Companies like V, MA, FISV, FIS and GPN are likely to navigate industry challenges.

headline: Perion Network Q4 Earnings Call Highlights
summary: Perion Network (NASDAQ:PERI) used its fourth-quarter and full-year 2025 earnings call to highlight what executives described as a major business reset and the early results of its “Perion One” strategy, positioning the company as an AI-native execution infrastructure for digital advertising. headline: Spendsafe partners with University College London's AI-education accelerator to deliver measurable impact through fintech
summary: Students can solve quadratic equations but often cannot balance a budget. Spendsafe tackles this disconnect by partnering with UCL EdTech Labs to embed world-leading impact measurement, pairing age-appropriate AI with a financial literacy curriculum to deliver measurable results.

headline: Cloudflare Mastercard Cybersecurity Alliance And What It May Mean For NET
summary: Cloudflare and Mastercard announced a partnership to build cybersecurity tools for small businesses and critical infrastructure providers. The collaboration combines Cloudflare’s application security products with Mastercard’s attack surface monitoring to create unified threat detection and response. The joint offering is aimed at providing more accessible, integrated protection for organizations that often have limited security resources. For investors tracking Cloudflare, NYSE:NET, this...

headline: Ericsson and Mastercard enhance global digital money movement and accelerate digital financial inclusion
summary: Ericsson (NASDAQ: ERIC) and Mastercard today announce a collaboration to reshape how money moves across the world. By integrating the Ericsson Fintech Platform (Mobile Financial Services) with Mastercard Move - Mastercard's portfolio of money movement solutions - the collaboration will empower telecom service providers, banks, and fintechs to expand digital wallet capabilities, launch new payment services, and reach unbanked or underbanked communities.

raw.headline: Ericsson and Mastercard enhance global digital money movement and accelerate digital financial inclusion
